com.noctarius.snowcast

Interface Snowcast


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface Snowcast

    The Snowcast instance is a SnowcastSequencer factory bound to HazelcastInstance instance. A Snowcast instance is built using the SnowcastSystem entry point. 

         HazelcastInstance hazelcastInstance = getHazelcastInstance();
     Snowcast snowcast = SnowcastSystem.snowcast( hazelcastInstance );

    Depending on the given HazelcastInstance (Hazelcast client or embedded node) the returned Snowcast implementation is different. Anyways the implementation is fully thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SnowcastSequencer createSequencer(String sequencerName, SnowcastEpoch epoch)
      Creates a SnowcastSequencer or returns an already existing instance based on the given sequencerName and custom epoch.
      SnowcastSequencer createSequencer(String sequencerName, SnowcastEpoch epoch, int maxLogicalNodeCount)
      Creates a SnowcastSequencer or returns an already existing instance based on the given sequencerName and custom epoch.
      void destroySequencer(SnowcastSequencer sequencer)
      Destroys the given SnowcastSequencer instance.

    • Method Detail

      • createSequencer

        @Nonnull
SnowcastSequencer createSequencer(@Nonnull
                                        String sequencerName,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        SnowcastEpoch epoch)
        Creates a SnowcastSequencer or returns an already existing instance based on the given sequencerName and custom epoch. This method is fully thread-safe and safe to be called concurrently.
        This operation is a cluster wide operation and blocks until the sequencer's configuration is registered or checked and the SnowcastSequencer instance is created or retrieved.
        Parameters:
        sequencerName - the reference name of the distributed sequencer
        epoch - the custom epoch for this sequencer
        Returns:
        a new SnowcastSequencer instance or an existing one matching the sequencerName and epoch

      • createSequencer

        @Nonnull
SnowcastSequencer createSequencer(@Nonnull
                                        String sequencerName,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        SnowcastEpoch epoch,
                                        @Min(value=128L)@Max(value=8192L)
                                        int maxLogicalNodeCount)
        Creates a SnowcastSequencer or returns an already existing instance based on the given sequencerName and custom epoch. This method is fully thread-safe and safe to be called concurrently.
        This operation is a cluster wide operation and blocks until the sequencer's configuration is registered or checked and the SnowcastSequencer instance is created or retrieved.
        Parameters:
        sequencerName - the reference name of the distributed sequencer
        epoch - the custom epoch for this sequencer
        maxLogicalNodeCount - the maximal logical node ID, must be between 128 and 8192
        Returns:
        a new SnowcastSequencer instance or an existing one matching the sequencerName and epoch

      • destroySequencer

        void destroySequencer(@Nonnull
                    SnowcastSequencer sequencer)
        Destroys the given SnowcastSequencer instance. A sequencer should be destroyed by the same Snowcast instance it was created with otherwise unexpected behavior might occur.
        This operation is a cluster wide operation and destroys all instances of the referenced SnowcastSequencer on all nodes! Existing references to this sequencer will transition to state SnowcastSequenceState.Destroyed and cannot be used to generate further snowcast sequence IDs.
        Parameters:
        sequencer - the sequencer to destroy
